name: Smooch Quest
description:
A short game made for fun for a thing on my tumblr http://asksirlintalot.tumblr.com/

all illustrations were drawn by me

The game was made using TyranoBuilder

all music sources royalty free from www.dl-sounds.com

the following tracks were used: Acoustic Love, Fantasy Game Loop,Hurry Up , Musala, Slow5-90, Tbone and friends and Oniku Loop.
